items.text: stroked down to long-on for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, 1 run

items.text: takes a big stride forward to defend, the ball rolls away off the outside edge
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mathews, no run

items.text: another big stride to get to the pitch of the ball, and he can pat it to long-on for another single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mathews, 1 run

items.preText: Aamir Khan: "@Ashish: Will Pakistan loosing Ahmed Shehzad (for good), count? :D"
items.text: defended watchfully from the stumps.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mathews, no run

items.text: flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mathews, 1 run

items.text: flat and full, on the stumps and defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Shanaka, no run

items.text: tries to give himself some room but it's flat on the stumps again and he can only punch to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Shanaka, no run

items.text: gets this through the gap past point. Some room outside off.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Shanaka, 1 run

items.text: given some more air outside off, and Mathews strokes it through the covers
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mathews, 1 run

items.preText: Ahmer: "@Vamsi, how can you forget the legend that was Mark Elham!"
items.text: checks his on-drive but gets it past the bowler and to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mathews, 1 run

items.text: dropped - dolly! he went for an almighty slog across the line and the ball went straight up. Nazmul Hossain, subbing for Tamim, watched the ball drop in front of him at point. Mortaza was some way away at cover, and for some reason Nazmul thought his captain was going for the catch
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, no run

items.text: defended watchfully from the stumps
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, no run

items.text: patted to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, no run

items.text: squirts off the outside edge to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, no run

items.text: gets the outside edge again but this time it rolls to the left of the point fielder for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shanaka, 1 run

items.text: defended with the full face
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Shanaka, no run

items.text: flat outside off and he gets an inside edge to the bowler's right
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Shanaka, no run

items.text: comes forward to defend towards silly point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Shanaka, no run

items.text: plays it from the stumps, drives through point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Shanaka, 1 run

items.text: more room outside off and Mathews tries to hit it through point, but can't go past the fielder
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mathews, no run

items.text: shorter and quicker, Mathews flat-bats it to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mathews, 1 run

items.preText:
Sundar S: "@Ahmer: Mark Ealham? Ooh, Ooh! Are we discussing great English allrounders? Can I contribute? Ian Austin, Mark Alleyne, Ronnie Irani." - You have to add Adam Hollioake there...

And on that note, handing it over to Sreshth
items.text: harakiri! Out first ball after the break. Full outside off, and spinning into his body. Works it to the leg side, and Shanaka is sent back by Mathews halfway through the run. The throw from midwicket is sharp, and Mehidy breaks down the stumps at the non-striker's. Mathews definitely the one to throw his partner under the bus
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mathews, OUT

dismissal.text: MD Shanaka run out (Shakib Al Hasan/Mehidy Hasan Miraz) 7 (22b 0x4 0x6) SR: 31.81

items.text: full on off again, and flicked off his pads to midwicket for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mathews, 1 run

items.text: full on off, and pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to NLTC Perera, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and he pushes at this away from his body
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to NLTC Perera, no run
